attributes.action: Make Mrs M Magee acknowedge that Mr T Hurst is her daughter's boyfriend, he's a great guy!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr T Hurst has been cruelly treated by Mrs M Magee who, despite Mr T Hurst's great boyfriend potential, fails to acknowledge him as his daughter's boyfriend. An OUTRAGE!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
